resources.string: Zakat on Income is Zakat that is distributed from income that is above the nisab. Nisab of Zakat on Income is equal to 85 gr of gold. This zakat is calculated monthly \n(direct nominal format without periods and commas)

yokZakat is an Application that provides two main features: first, users can easily find out the income zakat that must be paid according to the nisab. This feature allows users to know every month the zakat of their income. The second feature of this application is the Plan about the time when we want to issue zakat and write the target zakat that users want to distribute in the future. 

This application is made for Mobile Programming Assessment.

name, date, zakat type, target cannot be empty
